title: Darning sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and eyelet stitches on  plain weave foundation
description: Multi-colored stitching on a cream-colored linen ground. Eighteen crosses and four darned corners demonstrate different repair techniques. Large square in center was removed and darned back. Additionally, one corner square was cut out and then darned back into the fabric. The eighteen crosses and other three corners were cut away, then the fabric was rebuilt by darning.
name: Darning sampler
